pop-up-menu.title: Share the project of Ukrainian cultural heritage with the world.

home-info.title: 1000 & 1 song
home-info.subtitle: We have collected traditional Ukrainian songs of various genres from all regions. Let's popularize Ukraine together

about.stub: The 'About the project' page is under development

expeditions.title: Expeditions
expeditions.intro: The priorities of modern times are the filling of «white spots» on the folkloristic map of Ukraine (eastern Volhynia, Dnieper region, southern Chernihiv region, Sumy region, Berezhany region, and other territories), as well as specialized regional programs for publishing song collections based on materials from specific ethnographic locales.
